TC

Class playertank

  • java.lang.Object
    • TC.playertank

  • public class playertank
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the tank that the player will be controlling.
    Version:
    3/6/15
    Author:
    UCSB-CS48-W15-G08

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int health
      The current health of the player.

      The player's initial health.
      int numberofsuperpower
      Number of superpowers (rockets) the player has initially.

      The final amount of superpowers (rockets) the player has after game over or after every use of a superpower (rocket).

      Player tank image with health bar.

      The player's vertical acceleration.
      int ygun
      The player's gun's y position.
      int ygunontank
      The player's bullet's y position.
      double yspeed
      The player's vertical speed (used for jumping).

      • shooting

        public boolean shooting(long gametime)
        Set player tank shooting and the period between shooting.
        Returns:
        a boolean that indicates a bullet can be shot when there's a left click. returns false otherwise.

      • superpowering

        public boolean superpowering(long gametime)
        Set player tank using superpower and the period between using the superpower.
        Returns:
        a boolean that indicates the superpower is used when there's a right click. returns false otherwise.
